about_the_game:
CRIMSON METAL - Original soundtrack was created by Andrij Matskevych and Vlad Venom.
Enjoy this amazing album:

1. Andrij Matskevych - CRIMSON METAL
2. Andrij Matskevych - Cyber Glitch
3. Andrij Matskevych - Hidden threat
4. Andrij Matskevych - Reversed Order
5. Andrij Matskevych - Something here
6. Andrij Matskevych - Strafe Forward
7. Andrij Matskevych - System Shock
8. Andrij Matskevych - Time shift
9. Andrij Matskevych - Vigilance
10. Andrij Matskevych -This is only the beginning
11. Vlad Venom - Future 2.0
12. Vlad Venom - iamthefuture
13. Vlad Venom - Identification
14. Vlad Venom - Techwar
15. Vlad Venom - Alcatraz
16. Vlad Venom - Aliens hacked humanity
17. Vlad Venom - Ark
18. Vlad Venom - Cerberus
19. Vlad Venom - Deep Pain
20. Vlad Venom - Humanity
21. Vlad Venom - Medussa
22. Vlad Venom - Save us (slow)
23. Vlad Venom - Save us
24. Vlad Venom - The GRID
25. Vlad Venom - This city will be burnt
26. Vlad Venom - Unknown targets

files will be placed in you CRIMSON METAL folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\CRIMSON METAL\CRIMSON METAL OST

ENJOY!
